modName: Guide for the best performance - Guia para a melhor performance
summary: Guide to help you achieve the best performance with some texture and effect mods without losing much quality. Guia para ajudar você a conseguir a melhor performance com alguns mods de textura e efeitos sem perder muito da qualidade.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][color=#000000]Description[/color]: [color=#0000ff]E[/color][color=#ff0000]N[/color]G / [color=#00ff00]P[/color][color=#ffff00]T[/color][/size]
[size=4][color=#0000ff]Eng[/color][color=#ff0000]lis[/color]h[/size]
[color=#00ffff]Hi guys im here to help everyone who have problems to run Skyrim Legendary Edition and vanilla smoothly. (Only mods, no INI)
I know how hard is to find the best performance mods for Skyrim out there and that's why I decided to post this guide, without further ado let's go to the mods.
I recommend you to lower your resolution if it keep sluggish after all mods installed.[/color]
[size=4]
[color=#00ff00]Por[/color][color=#ffff00]tug[/color][color=#0000ff]ue[/color]se[/size]
[color=#ffe599]Oi pessoal, eu estou aqui para ajudar todos que não conseguem rodar Skyrim Legendary Edition e a versão sem DLCs "lisamente". (Só mods, sem INI)
Eu sei o quão difícil é achar bons mods de performance para Skyrim pela internet e é por isso que resolvi postar esse guia, sem mais delongas vamos aos mods.
Eu recomendo que diminuam a sua resolução se ainda estiver travando depois da instalação dos mods.[/color]
[size=3]Veja a sessão "[/size][color=#00ffff]Ini Tweaks[/color][size=3]" nesse [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68010/?]outro guia[/url][size=3], recomendo [/size][color=#ff0000]não baixar a ENB que ele mostra no guia e nem o ULTRA REALISTIC WORLD LIGHTNING, o Skyrim Performance Plus é dispensável pois o [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53692]Low Res Particles and Flora - LRPF[/url] já substitui os efeitos de chuva e neve mas se quiser ganhar alguns fps das folhas caindo pode baixar[/color][size=3].[/size]

[font=lucida sans unicode, lucida grande, sans-serif][size=6][[color=#f6b26b]Te[/color][color=#e69138]x[/color][color=#b45f06]tu[/color][color=#783f04]r[/color][color=#b45f06]e M[/color][color=#e69138]o[/color][color=#f6b26b]ds[/color]][/size][/font]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42360]Bethesda Performance Textures - Armor - Clothes - Weapons[/url][size=3] / [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43921]Bethesda Performance Textures - Animals and Creatures[/url]
[size=2][color=#00ffff]Change some armor, clothes, weapons, animals and creatures textures in the game with compressed ones.[/color] [color=#000000]Help who has less than 4GB of Ram.[/color]
[color=#ffe599]Trocam algumas texturas de armaduras, roupas, armas, animais e criaturas do jogo por umas mais leves.[/color] [/size][color=#000000][size=2]Ajuda quem possui menos de 4GB de Ram.
[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57353/?]Optimized Vanilla Textures[/url]
[/color][size=2][color=#00ffff]Replace all textures in the game with optimized textures. [/color][color=#ff0000]You can download Optimized Vanilla Textures and Bethesda Performance Textures to replace textures of armors and creatures of Optimized Vanilla Textures, as these textures are more beautiful and optimized in Bethesda Performance Textures.[/color]
[color=#ffe599]Substitui todas as texturas do jogo por texturas mais leves e otimizadas. [/color][/size][color=#ff0000][size=2]Você pode baixar Optimized Vanilla Textures e a Bethesda Performance Textures, substituindo texturas de animais e armaduras com a Bethesda Performance Textures já que as texturas das armaduras e criaturas são mais bonitas e mais otimizadas nesse.[/size]
[/color][color=#ff00ff][size=1]Mod suggestion: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/7824124]MisterB1969[/url][/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64611]Insignificant Object Remover[/url]
[size=2][color=#00ffff]Remove some underwater plants and small rocks for more performance.[/color]
[color=#ffe599]Remove algumas algas e pedras pequenas para uma melhor performance.[/color]
[/size]
[size=6][[color=#6d9eeb]Ef[/color][color=#3c78d8]f[/color][color=#1155cc]e[/color][color=#0b5394]ct [/color][color=#1155cc]M[/color][color=#3c78d8]o[/color][color=#6d9eeb]ds[/color]][/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10789]Colorful Lights - No Shadows - More FPS[/url]
[color=#00ffff][size=2]If you have all DLCs then download the mod bellow too.[/size]
[/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54964]Colorful Lights - No Shadows - DLCs[/url]
[color=#ffe599][size=2]Se você tem todas as DLCs baixe o mod acima também.[/size][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54964]
[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53692]Low Res Particles and Flora - LRPF[/url]
[size=2][color=#00ffff]Change some plant textures and effects with smaller ones.[/color] [color=#000000]Help who has onboard video card[/color].
[color=#ffe599]Trocam algumas texturas de plantas e efeitos por versões mais leves.[/color] [color=#000000]Ajuda quem tem placa de vídeo integrada[/color].
[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/736]Interior and Dungeon Fog Remover[/url][size=3] / [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9930]Revamped Exterior Fog[/url]
[size=2][color=#00ffff]Both mods above are compatible don't worry.[/color] [color=#000000]Remove the fog and grants you few more fps[/color].
[color=#ffe599]Os dois mods acima são compatíveis não sem preocupem.[/color] [color=#000000]Remove a neblina e te dão alguns poucos frames[/color].
[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53014]Dynamically Disable Eye Adaptation and Bloom[/url][size=3] / [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32064]Immersive Saturation Boost[/url]
[size=2][color=#00ffff]Help with lightning and bloom.[/color][color=#000000] [/color][color=#b6b6b6]Immersive Saturation is optional.[/color]
[color=#ffe599]Ajuda com a iluminação e o bloom.[/color][color=#000000] [/color][color=#b6b6b6]O segundo mod é opcional.[/color][/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32505]
Skyrim Project Optimization[/url]
[color=#00ffff][size=2]Probably the best performance mod for Skyrim, read the description[/size][/color][size=3] [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32505/?]here[/url][size=3].[/size]
[size=2][color=#ffe599]Provavelmente o melhor mod de performance para Skyrim. Leia a descrição[/color] [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32505/?]aqui[/url][size=3].[/size]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1265]No more Radial Blur - Performance optimization[/url]
[size=2][color=#00ffff]Remove the Radial Blur from the the game.[/color] [color=#000000]Works with Legendary. [/color][color=#b6b6b6]May work in vanilla[/color].
[color=#ffe599]Remove o Radial Blur do jogo.[/color] [color=#000000]Funciona com a Legendary Edition[/color]. [color=#999999]Pode funcionar na versão sem DLCs[/color].[/size]

[color=#00ffff][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/5679]Remove Clouds[/url]
[size=2]Remove the clouds from the game.[/size][/color][size=2] [color=#000000]Works with Legendary. [/color][color=#b6b6b6]May work in vanilla[/color].
[color=#ffe599]Remove as nuvens do jogo.[/color] [color=#000000]Funciona com a Legendary Edition[/color]. [color=#999999]Pode funcionar na versão sem DLCs[/color].
[/size][/center]
author: GabrielFM07

files.name: No Files. Download the mods from the original modders post.
